headline: A Designer Riffs on His Own Relevance
abstract: As he readies a new men’s collection for Milan, the designer riffs on relevance, confidence and even a future outside fashion.
lead_paragraph: MILAN — Almost five years to the week since the lightning strike that was Alessandro Michele’s debut at Gucci — an event that business schools will study for a long time to come — the designer found himself reflecting on his own inevitable obsolescence.
